page.title: 057-11 IN NORTHWOOD HILLS
page.content: The 7-11 in Northwood Hills first opened some time in the November of '84.It is open from 7a.m. till 11p.m. thus the title of the shop.The shop is like an American drug-store.It sells everything you need for everyday life,food,books,drinks and sweets are just a few.It is at the bottom of the hill next to the roundabout and is usually quite full.Most people like it but some think that these types of shop will take over and no decent shops will remain.The actual chain of shops originated from America and people are scared of becoming like Americans.Others like the idea of big shops selling everything.They like the fast service.Personally I like the idea of the fast service but I wouldn't like all shops to be like this.
